the funny part is everything you guys post is wrong.

the uploader is not the person who records these movies, so personal attacks against the uploader are just moronic.  the uploader is simply taking this movie from another source and providing us with their bandwidth.

in very rare circumstances an uploader may try to improve the quality of a movie by running it through filters or syncing audio.... but its really uncommon. most of them just take it from another site and post it here... then you morons act like they personally went into a theater and recorded it... lol.


for another thing, the first prometheus cams were unwatchable shit, so saying its equal to that is basically saying its shit.

if you have to use the term "its free" to describe the quality, what you are basically saying is its shit.

shit is shit, if its free or not, its still shit.

you should post realistic ratings so you can help other people by preventing them from wasting their time instead of trying to shove your head in the uploaders ass and saying things like "its awesome, its free"
Quality aside, this movie was unwatchable even in theaters.
